it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.view

Class VirtualBoardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.view.VirtualBoardView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, RemoteObservable, BoardViewInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class VirtualBoardView
extends Observable
implements BoardViewInterface
    Virtual board view, relays invocations over the network to the actual board view.
    See Also:
